decks.notes: Utilize a combination of graveyard recursion, disruption, and card selection to quickly bring powerful creatures into play and overwhelm the opponent. The deck focuses on using cards like Reanimate and Entomb to put creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty into play early in the game. Thoughtseize and Daze help control the opponent's game plan, while Brainstorm and Polluted Delta provide card selection and mana fixing. The overall strategy is to assemble the necessary pieces quickly and efficiently to create a powerful board state that is difficult for the opponent to overcome.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy while maintaining a tempo advantage through using cards like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Daze. It also utilizes efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Nethergoyf to control the board. The inclusion of Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides additional disruption options. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early in the game with aggression from Orcish Bowmasters and Brazen Borrower, while maintaining card advantage and control over the battlefield.

The main concept of this Dredge combo deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with cards like Golgari Grave-Troll and Stinkweed Imp, allowing you to play cards from your graveyard and trigger abilities like Bridge from Below. Cards like Lion's Eye Diamond and Cabal Therapy help to control your opponent's hand and field, while Otherworldly Gaze and Breakthrough provide additional card draw and filtering. The goal is to overwhelm your opponent with powerful creatures and spells from the graveyard, putting them on the back foot and setting up for a game-winning Dread Return.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by utilizing counterspells, removal, and card draw to outvalue opponents. It focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while generating card advantage through efficient spells like Brainstorm and Ponder. The deck also includes ways to deal with threats on the board using removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Thundertrap Trainer provide additional card advantage and support in grinding out games. Overall, this deck aims to control the pace of the game and outmaneuver opponents to secure victory.

This UWx Control deck focuses on card advantage and control, utilizing powerful spells like Swords to Plowshares and Brainstorm to control the board. The deck also includes key creatures like Murktide Regent and Snapcaster Mage for additional threats. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student is used for card draw and digging for answers. The deck also includes disruption with Force of Will and Thoughtseize, while also maintaining flexibility with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the powerful spells and creatures in the deck.

This deck aims to quickly assemble a powerful combination of artifacts, including Mystic Forge and Manifold Key, to generate immense card advantage and mana acceleration. The key strategy involves using cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Tezzeret, Cruel Captain to efficiently control the battlefield and outpace opponents. By utilizing powerful artifacts like The One Ring and Glaring Fleshraker, the deck can quickly close out games with overwhelming force. With a focus on combo potential and resource management, this deck is designed to dominate the Legacy format with its unique synergy and explosive plays.

The deck focuses on utilizing the interaction between Nomads en-Kor and Nadu, Winged Wisdom to create a powerful combo that can generate a large amount of card advantage and potentially win the game in a single turn. The deck also includes control elements such as Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares to protect the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The mana base allows for consistent access to the necessary colors for the combo and control spells, ensuring that the deck can execute its game plan effectively.

The deck focuses on quickly milling your entire library using Undercity Informer, Balustrade Spy, and other means to put Thassa's Oracle on top of your library and win the game with its enter the battlefield ability. The deck aims to assemble the combo as quickly as possible by using rituals and fast mana to cast multiple spells in a single turn. It also includes ways to protect the combo with Pact of Negation and disrupt your opponent's game plan with cards like Cabal Therapy.

This UWx Control deck focuses on card advantage and disruption to control the board and win through incremental advantage. The deck runs a mix of counterspells like Force of Will and Spell Pierce, along with removal in Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending. Card filtering with Ponder and Brainstorm helps find the right answers, while Snapcaster Mage provides value by recasting key spells. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps draw cards and Magus of the Moon can disrupt opponent's mana bases. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler for additional control.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bring them back onto the battlefield to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes counterspells like Force of Will to protect your combo pieces, as well as bounce spells like Brazen Borrower to deal with threats. The deck aims to win the game through assembling a powerful board presence early on and controlling the game with disruption spells to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to create tempo advantage by disrupting the opponent's plays while deploying efficient threats, such as Barrowgoyf and Nethergoyf, to close out the game quickly. It looks to control the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and disrupt the opponent with cards like Thoughtseize and Daze. The addition of powerful planeswalkers like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares adds versatility and long-term value to the deck. Overall, the deck aims to maintain pressure and aggression while disrupting the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on using efficient creatures like Noble Hierarch and Wight of the Reliquary to quickly pressure opponents and disrupt their game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Collector Ouphe. The deck also utilizes powerful lands like Gaea's Cradle and Wasteland to gain an advantage on the battlefield. Overall, the deck aims to establish a strong board presence early on and overwhelm opponents with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells.

The deck focuses on utilizing Cloudpost lands to quickly ramp up mana and cast powerful threats like Ugin, Eye of the Storm and Karn, the Great Creator. The main goal is to establish a strong board presence using cards like The One Ring and Planar Nexus while disrupting the opponent's strategy with counterspells like Force of Will and Force of Negation. Additionally, the deck utilizes powerful artifacts like Chalice of the Void and Thundertrap Trainer to control the game and make it difficult for the opponent to mount a defense.

The deck focuses on using fast mana sources like Grim Monolith and Lotus Petal to quickly cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer. It also utilizes cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to pressure the opponent with aggressive Eldrazi creatures while also controlling the board with disruptive spells and land destruction. It leverages the Eldrazi tribe's synergy and powerful abilities to overwhelm and outpace the opponent.

This deck aims to control the game by disrupting the opponent's strategy with counterspells and targeted removal while simultaneously applying pressure with efficient creatures. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to disrupt the opponent's hand and then deploying threats like Nethergoyf and Brazen Borrower, the deck aims to put the opponent on the back foot and close out the game quickly. The deck's mana base is designed to support its aggressive game plan while also providing access to powerful dual lands like Underground Sea and Wasteland for additional disruption.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through disruption with cards like Thoughtseize, Smallpox, and Witherbloom Command while generating value and card advantage with Life from the Loam and Urza's Saga. It also aims to outvalue the opponent with the recursion of lands and creatures through Loam and Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis. The deck can also close out games quickly with the powerful token generation of Urza's Saga and Eumidian Hatchery. The inclusion of cards like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Malevolent Rumble provide additional threats and removal options to deal with various strategies.
